Name: VE GSIM Tower Crane Simulator
About the game: Free Update: New content, new interactable elements. Follow a sequence of objectives to further complete the construction site. This is a virtual reality tower crane simulator where you can experience the view and the height from the top of a tower crane inside the operators cabin. You have the option to pick up a several elements from the construction site below and lift it with the tower crane. Complete objectives not unlike the challenges a real crane operator might encounter in their job. You have various scenarios you can do, like scenario 1, lifting out of a lift shaft, scenario 2 landing on the shaffolding, scenario 3 lifting from a truck with slightly skew lifting, and lifing in wind. You can change weather from sunshine, snow and rain. With LAN you can do multiplayer where one can simulate the groundworker and the groundplayer will be teleported to help for each scenario. Crane driver control the scenario. Key Features. - A virtual reality experience (VR) - Realistic tower crane simulator. - Lift several elements around on the construction site. - Construction site with a city environment.
